parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: NamespaceInfos
parameters.description: The information about the namespace for which Microservices Engine(MSE) Microservices Governance is enabled.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the instance resides. The region is supported by MSE.
